Sony Xperia Devices

NOTE WE CANNOT SIM UNLOCK SONY XPERIA DEVICES

Details and Exceptions

Generic Flash Instructions:

All Sony devices are handled through Flashtool, Please follow the common flashing instructions below:

  1. Open Flashtool from the start menu on your PC
  2. Click the lightning bolt symbol at the top left of the window
  3. Select Flash Mode and click OK
  4. Select the device you are flashing from the list of devices
  5. Wait while files are unpacked, the program will prompt you to connect the device once complete
  6. Hold the Volume down button and connect the device
  7. If a prompt pops up asking if an FSC script should be used select Yes
  8. Wait while device is flashed
  9. Once complete the device will reboot automatically
  10. (if the device fails to reboot press the hardware reset button usually located in the sim card slot)
